event.title: Tour01)The Minoyaki Pottery Guide
event.description:
http://www.experiencegifu.com/
Nagara Tobo Ceramics was established in 2003 by the Master Potter, Shinji Majita. Specializing in the Mino-yaki style pottery, he has inherited and maintains its tradi-tional techniques such as Shino and Oribe.
The program offers you a detailed ex-planation about Japanese pottery and how minoyaki is crafted.
event.place: 岐阜県岐阜市長良51番地2
